At JavaOne 2008 the daily edition of "JavaOne Today" features an interview with Sun's Tor Norbye saying "Java and the Flex SDK are both open sourced. I hope they both benefit from community involvement at whatever level people choose to get involved." Funny thing is that this is actually a quote from Chet Haase of Adobe which was featured in yesterday's JavaOne Today. Whoops. See a picture from Tor's interview below.
